footer.tagline: Logic-driven software where mathematical precision meets human-centric design.

hero.headline: High-Performance
hero.subheading: Stop letting bloated Shopify apps kill your conversions. {brand} builds elite-tier tools with {payload} payloads that keep your Core Web Vitals green.

foundersMoat.headline: Built Different
foundersMoat.quote: "AppLass apps are developed using mathematical optimization techniques to minimize JavaScript execution time."

solutions.headline: Logical
solutions.description: We don't just build features; we engineer {highlight} that solve core business logic bottlenecks.

what-is.question: What is AppLass?
what-is.answer: AppLass is an elite software engineering studio that builds high-performance Shopify apps and Android utilities. Founded in 2019, we use mathematical optimization to create sub-2.1KB payloads that keep Core Web Vitals green. Our flagship products include ScreenVeil, FomoGen, and Mindful Guard.

accessibility.question: Is AppLass software accessible?
accessibility.answer: Yes. All AppLass products follow WCAG 2.1 guidelines with semantic HTML and keyboard-navigable patterns. We build for the 20% of users with disabilities to create a superior experience for the 100%.

speed.question: How does AppLass optimize for speed?
speed.answer: We minimize JavaScript execution time to the micro-second using mathematical optimization. Core utility payloads stay under 2.1KB to ensure green Core Web Vitals scores.

privacy.question: What is AppLass's privacy policy?
privacy.answer: AppLass uses Zero-Telemetry Architecture. We never log personal identifiers, track user behavior, or include third-party analytics SDKs. All data stays 100% on-device for maximum user privacy.

screenveil.name: ScreenVeil
screenveil.description: Save 60%+ battery on AMOLED/OLED displays. Listen to YouTube, podcasts, and music with your screen off. Zero permissions, total privacy.

fomogen.name: FomoGen
fomogen.tagline: Social Proof Without the Speed Penalty
fomogen.description: Elite social proof with a proprietary <2.1KB payload. Boost engagement by +23% without triggering 'Long Task' warnings or SEO speed penalties.

mindfulGuard.name: Mindful Guard
mindfulGuard.description: System-level productivity guardian built with a zero-tracking, privacy-first architecture. Reclaim an average of 2.4 hours of focus daily with 100% on-device data sovereignty.

eliteExpertise.title: Elite Expertise
eliteExpertise.label: 7 Years Full-Stack
eliteExpertise.description: Deep experience building scalable systems for e-commerce and high-productivity mobile environments.

logicalIntegrity.title: Logical Integrity
logicalIntegrity.label: Mathematics Core
logicalIntegrity.description: Every algorithm and interaction is modeled with mathematical precision to maximize performance and reliability.

radicalAccessibility.title: Radical Accessibility
radicalAccessibility.label: WCAG 2.1 First
radicalAccessibility.description: Accessibility is not a feature; it's the foundation. We build software that respects every user's capabilities.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Optimization
ecommerce.description: Conversion engineering for modern brands. We solve the technical debt that slows down growth through mathematical optimization.

digitalDiscipline.title: Digital Discipline Design
digitalDiscipline.description: Focus tools that respect human psychology through mathematical constraints and systemic guardrails. Engineered for the elite-tier producer.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Consulting
accessibility.description: Transforming digital products to be inclusive from the core. Level up your WCAG score logically with a zero-regression foundation.

home.title: Applass: Productivity & Privacy Solutions for the 2026 Digital World
home.description: Home of Mindful Guard and ScreenVeil. Discover advanced Android focus tools and Shopify apps designed to protect your privacy and boost ROI.
